name: sb8e
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0
body: |- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))

stmt.origin: cbvex(s0, s1, w0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wnf(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)

comment: Substitution of variable in existential quantifier. For a version requiring disjoint variables, but fewer axioms, see ~ sb8ev . (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2016.) (Proof shortened by Jim Kingdon, 15-Jan-2018.)
